projects.title: Document Forensics
projects.bodyText:
- Tool made with python to detect forgery in images and PDFs
 -  Uses image processing algorithms and machine learning to detect any signs of tampering on images and PDFs with near 100% success rate 
 - Handwriting detection on printed receipts using a classification model developed from scratch

projects.title: Image and Medical Segmentation
projects.bodyText:
- Image segmentation projects that use deep learning models to isloate areas of an image that are of medical interest
 - Used custom written pytorch computer vision models as well as foundational models such as segment-anything
 - Output results are used by research team.

projects.title: Intelligent Document Analysis
projects.bodyText:
- Application made using python that leverages Azure Doc intelligence to efficiently extract key fields of interest from invoices and receipts
 -  Custom algorithms on top of doc intelligence for a more tailored output 
 - Used by finance team to generate insights

projects.title: Understanding of Data in Images
projects.bodyText:
- Use LLMs and image processing to understand data in images 
 - Langchain is used with openAI, bedrock etc to provide multiple options to the user.
 - Can generate text summaries of data in graphs, plots, etc

projects.title: Lip Sync - Audio Cloning
projects.bodyText:
- POC to take videos and translate them while keeping the original voice
 - Uses opensource and custom models with techniques such as LipGANs, FaceGans etc for lip syncing the video to a new audio
 - TTS and transciptions models are used on the audio side for a complete pipeline

projects.title: Image Translation
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a tool to translate images from one language to another using only image processing techniques
 - Can translate images in a pdf and replace them in place
 - works on all languages and leverages google translate for text translation

projects.title: V2X Robot communication using LIDAR
projects.bodyText:
- Wrote a custom simulation using ROS2 for robots equipped with LIDAR to communicate with each other on map to avoid collisions.
 - uses ROS2 HUMBLE with python along with Gazebo for simulation
 - Also worked on physcial robots - XIAOR-GEEK LIDAR ROBOT

projects.title: AI Avatar Generation
projects.bodyText:
- Leverages Azure AI speech resources and text to speech avatars
 - Python code to invoke model and customize avatar movements 
 - developed for the marketting team
